# verificationData

**Instance Property**

Data you use to verify that the response came from the account provider.

## Declaration

```swift
var verificationData: Data? { get }
```

## Discussion

Use the data in this property to cryptographically verify that [doc://com.apple.videosubscriberaccount/documentation/VideoSubscriberAccount/VSAccountMetadata/samlAttributeQueryResponse] came from the account provider.

## Getting App Authentication Info

- **accountProviderResponse**: The response from the account provider.
- **samlAttributeQueryResponse**: The SAML response from the account provider.
